net.dean.jraw.managers

Class ModerationManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.dean.jraw.managers.AbstractManager
      • net.dean.jraw.managers.ModerationManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    NetworkAccessible

    public class ModerationManager
extends AbstractManager
    This class manages actions most commonly reserved for moderators (although some of them can be used on yourself without moderator powers).

        Parameters:

      • setSticky

        @EndpointImplementation(value=SET_SUBREDDIT_STICKY)
public void setSticky(Submission s,
                                                                           boolean sticky)
                                                                    throws NetworkException,
                                                                           ApiException
        Set or unset a self post as a sticky. You must be a moderator of the subreddit the submission was posted in for this request to complete successfully.
        Parameters:
        s - The submission to set as a sticky. Must be a self post
        sticky - Whether or not to set the submission as a stickied post
        Throws:
        NetworkException - If the request was not successful
        ApiException - If the Reddit API returned an error

      • setFlair

        public void setFlair(java.lang.String subreddit,
                     FlairTemplate template,
                     java.lang.String text)
              throws NetworkException,
                     ApiException
        Sets the flair for the currently authenticated user
        Parameters:
        subreddit - The subreddit to set the flair on
        template - The template to use
        text - Optional text that will be used if the FlairTemplate's text is editable. If this is null and the template is editable, the template's default text will be used.
        Throws:
        NetworkException - If the request was not successful
        ApiException - If the API returned an error

      • setFlair

        public void setFlair(java.lang.String subreddit,
                     FlairTemplate template,
                     java.lang.String text,
                     java.lang.String username)
              throws NetworkException,
                     ApiException
        Sets the flair for a certain user. Must be a moderator of the subreddit if the user is not the currently authenticated user.
        Parameters:
        subreddit - The subreddit to set the flair on
        template - The template to use
        text - Optional text that will be used if the FlairTemplate's text is editable. If this is null and the template is editable, the template's default text will be used.
        username - The name of the user to set the flair for. If this is null the authenticated user's name will be used.
        Throws:
        NetworkException - If the request was not successful
        ApiException - If the API returned an error

      • setFlair

        public void setFlair(java.lang.String subreddit,
                     FlairTemplate template,
                     java.lang.String text,
                     Submission submission)
              throws NetworkException,
                     ApiException
        Sets the flair for a certain submission. If the currently authenticated user is not a moderator of the subreddit where the submission was posted, then the user must have posted the submission.
        Parameters:
        subreddit - The subreddit to set the flair on
        template - The template to use
        text - Optional text that will be used if the FlairTemplate's text is editable. If this is null and the template is editable, the template's default text will be used.
        submission - The submission to set the flair for
        Throws:
        NetworkException - If the request was not successful
        ApiException - If the API returned an error
